resources.string: A modplayer that plays over 90 mainstream and obscure module formats, including Protracker (MOD), Scream Tracker 3 (S3M), Fast Tracker II (XM) and Impulse Tracker (IT).
The directory where mod files are located
Choose default action when clicking on playlist item
Automatically pause replay when headset is disconnected

• Update player engine to libxmp 4.2.6
• Fix MED synth instrument volume
• Fix OctaMED MMD2 instrument transposition
• Fix segfault in NDK data retrieval
• Fix race condition at end of replay
• Fix notification order
• Fix index in Android 2.x notification
 
Version 3.7.2:
• Fix channel viewer crash
• Fix viewer display when paused
• Fix service lifecycle issues
• Fix notification ticker text
• Fix playlist reordering persistence
• Code refactoring and optimization
 
Version 3.7.1:
• Add notification actions (Android 4.1 and newer)
• Fix action bar menu items
• Fix intent filter to handle module files
• Fix thread leak issues
• (Hopefully) Fix launch from history issues
 
Version 3.7.0:
• Update player engine to libxmp 4.2.5
• Remove support to incomplete formats
• Add support to His Master's Noise format
• Improved MED, OKT and MDL support
• Fix XM envelope and delay effect
• Code refactoring and optimization
 
Version 3.6.2:
• Update player engine to libxmp 4.1.6-pre
• Improve interface accessibility
• Fix media buttons broadcast receiver
• Fix IT and XM portamento and envelopes
• Fix OctaMED synth and effects
• Fix Oktalyzer sample mapping
• Fix ThePlayer 5.0a/6.0a pattern decoding
• Code refactoring and optimization
 
Version 3.6.1:
• Update player engine to libxmp 4.1.2
• Fix handling of XM keyoff event
• Fix loss of precision in portamento
• Fix MTM sample fine tuning
 
Version 3.6.0:
• Update player engine to libxmp 4.1.0
• Improve precision of IT lowpass filter
• Fix IT portamento after note cut
• Fix IT envelopes with no envelope points
• Fix IT vibrato rate
• Fix XM invalid instrument event reading
• Fix MED portamento and pitch slides
• Fix Stonecracker depacker
 
Version 3.5.0:
• Update player engine to libxmp 4.0.4
• Add zoo depacker
• Fix IT pan effects
• Fix IT volume column slide to note
• Fix IT vibrato effect
• Fix MED BPM tempo setting
• Fix global volume slides
 
Version 3.4.4:
• Update player engine to libxmp 4.0.2
• Fix IT instrument vibrato depth and sweep
• Fix IT volume column vibrato
• Fix IT past note effects
• Fix IT note fadeout
• Fix global volume slides
Install example music files when creating modules directory
Long press modules to create new playlists or add to existing playlists. Long press playlists for more options.
Using libxmp %s written by Claudio Matsuoka and Hipolito Carraro Jr.
Can\'t create data directory. Please check your storage card and try again.
Set the size of sound buffer in milliseconds:
Display file names instead of titles in playlists
Display a menu option to delete the currently playing file
Prevent screen from sleeping during replay
Display titles instead of file names in browser (warning: may be slow)
